Detailed Description

Identifiers for text alignment.

Represents a single font. This class loads the font information from a TTF file, and draws the font to screen.

Member Function Documentation

def font.Font.drawText (   self,
  screen,
  texts,
  loc,
  fontSize,
  align = TEXT_ALIGN_LEFT,
  color = (255, 255 
)

Draw some text to the screen at the specified location.

Parameters:
texts A list of strings. Each string is drawn on a separate line.
fontSize Font size to use. If we haven't already loaded that size, then load it first.
align,: Text alignment. See the TEXT_ALIGN_* constants.
color,: PyGame-style color tuple, with alpha.
